attributes.action: Respect the privacy of people involved in a divorce and keep address details confidential by default.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As it currently stands, people need to swear an affidavit and give a valid reason in a county court why their former spouse should not have access to their new address in correspondence/documentation that is sent to the former spouse.  Surely, by the very nature of divorce, this information should be automatically kept confidential as this is violating one's fundamental right to privacy.
